name: getPath
javadoc:
/**
 * Returns a normalized and absolute path for the given file name.
 * If the file is located within one of the fenced directories, 
 * the original path is returned. Otherwise, an IllegalArgumentException is thrown.
 *
 * @param fileName the name of the file to get the path for
 * @return the normalized and absolute path for the file
 * @throws IllegalArgumentException if the file is not in any of the fenced directories
 */
